# Installation

- Git Clone
- Use Node 16 or 17
- `yarn` to install
- `yarn dev` To run local server
- `yarn build` To make a build

## Troublehsooting

- eslint version must be `6.7`, higher eslint version will break the compatibility with the images and won't build.
